Display.Protection: Shatter proof sapphire crystal glass, oleophobic coating

Platform.OS: Symbian^3, upgradable to Nokia Belle OS

Features.\u00a0:
Vertu Concierge service
SNS support
MP3/WMA/WAV/eAAC+ player
DivX/XviD/MP4/H.264/WMV player
Quickoffice document editor (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF)
Adobe Reader
Voice memo/dial/command
Predictive text input

Battery.Stand-by: Up to 400 h (2G) / Up to 400 h (3G)
Battery.Talk time: Up to 7 h (2G) / Up to 4 h 30 min (3G)

Misc.Colors: Stain/Polished stainless steel, brown/black/pink leather or black alligator skin
